critter.name: Rainbow Stag
critter.desc: Rainbow stags are called the most beautiful of stag beetles because of their metallic-rainbow color.  Not only are their wings a pretty rainbow color, but their bellies are as well.  They are quite laid back, but they can be seen every now and then fighting to protect their territories.
critter.quote: I caught a rainbow stag! Its rainbow armor is so shiny!
